body: Bruh

ummmm probably seirai is just an illusion from the beginning. Remember that she mentioned "lonely horni virgin". The mc (might) accidentally using hypnosis to himself and wishing for happiness then causing seirai existed (illusion ofc). 
But in the end he also break the hypnosis himself by saying "forget everything as if nothing happened"
That’s why you need proper wording in situations like these.
a sudden chill just goes down my spine
The ending ruined the whole sex
What a tweest. Bravo M. Night Shamalamadingdong!
Bruh this plot is crazy , every thing was an illusion he was in since the beginning , dang this is some tsukuyomi shit right there
My dick just got the chills
una esquizofrenia tenía
Haha lmao my boner getting a shiver from the ending, the thrill is awesome.

the thought alone is scary af since what make what we really are is our memories, since no one even knew about seira except him, you can confidently assume she is dead, after all the only person who ever knew her forgot about everything, every moment they had fun (be it an illusion or not), every sec of happiness she brought to him, even the moments of care she had for him were all destroyed, seira as a person, as a sister (be it illusion or not) stop existing and none of her efforts will carry on, so gentlemen, we can pay our condolences to seira (a sister, emotional support and human that now is not only dead but forgotten, she may thought she was truly real but now without the only thing who knew her in the existence forgetting about her, she is oficially dead).

oh shit i think i got it, his sister was probably a product of some type of hypnosis (basically she doesn't really exist) they put on him (probably to help him deal with some mental problem he had), he himself didn't know he was under a hypnosis. Funny shit is, he hypnotizes what he think is his sister and when everything is done he says "you'll forget everything as if nothing up to this point had happened." when he undo the hypnosis, the problem is: he undid the hypnosis he was in too (hypnosis where he has a little sister) causing him to return to normal, sadly the effect of his action (what he stated before) happens, making him forget about the hypnosis someone put on him (where he has a little sister) and forget about everything about her (sister) too (since he did say "you'll forget everything"). so that's what happens in the end, he undid the hypnosis he was under, so no more little sister and he make himself forget everything about it, that means he never did have a little sis .
Bruh sound effect 2
It was in the title all along
HOLY SHIT HE FORGOR💀💀💀
Fuck, I dont need fap nor sleep.I need ANSWERS
At first, I arrogantly expected the plot to go like the little sister is actually hold a feeling for her brother and acting to be hypnotized perfectly. Didn't expect the ending is twisted so hard tho

Take your meds you schizo.

Yo ngl that caught me off guard and spooked me
the story is kinda sad in the end but i wanna ask. in the end did the sister hypnotis him or he hynotis him self?
oh no he forgot his schizophrenia pills
So he hypnotised himself so he can think of a sister to fuck by hypnotising her
People here theorizing if he mind control himself or not. We can just totally assume he has a mental illness
hahhahahahhah. I cant stop laughing at the ending. The plot/story was straight forward 7/10.

Maybe the price to pay for the hypnosis he got is that, anything and everything that is related to the person you've hypnotized gets erased. Not only in your memories but their existence in the physical world as well.
Maybe there is a the consequences that when u use the hypno the on a person the after the hypno is done the person Will be erased from ur memories

Hmm, 1. she didn't exist to begin with or 2. she used the same trick on her brother and erased his memories as revenge for everything

I think is the 2, he could have imagined her, but even the furniture in his room was inside his mind? KEKW
I had forgottlen how dark the ending was... But something must be wrong in translation as the wording wouldn't allow - logically - that to happen.
*Everywhere at The End of Time flashbacks*
Holy shit son, that twist.... Man, Ichihaya always have one of twist that could shake your mind....
That was one hell of a plot twist
the ending... spooked me a lil
Bruh, almost COOM and that ending scared me

Remember he says “who am i to begin with” meaning he doesn’t know who he was
It could be he was under hypnotics for so Long he forgot himself when it stop
i don't need fap and sleep i need answers

I tried to add translatation for the character profile and afterward. 
[Profile] 
██ Seira(14)  
 Birthday: █ / █ 
 Likes: ██ 
 Hates: ██ 
 Breasts: ██  
A little sister, that have been together with since she were born.
When she was a little, she had been a quiet crybaby ██
She is cheerful and fashion-conscious, and many friends ███
It might be because of her puberty, she deals harshly with her brother ████
She can talk with almost anyone ████

[Afterward]
Oh, Afterward..... Seira has appeared in my old work, do you notice that? I had a hard time, because of my working environment has changed dramatically. I don't know the reader can feel about that...but, there are things we can't notice unless printing on paper. So, if you feel that something is changed, that's.... because of that! Well, until next time!
here's my take: he hypnotized to make himself think that he had a little sister but at the end it wore off? i'm not really sure
Maybe she hypnotized him after coming to her senses and got him locked in jail?

So...my assumption was he hypnotized himself and his attempts to break "her" hypnosis is what he had set up to break his own hypnosis. As far as twists go, this one is a least a lot less depressing than some of Ichihaya's other works. I'm kind of hoping for a part two so we can see the actual circumstances, cause I can see it going a few ways.
so he yanked to the breaking point. impressive.
